Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Disable power menu on lock screen
This will only disable the power menu on secure lock screens
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
Show charging current, voltage, wattage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Customize your statusbar clock and date
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enable the running services icon in the footer
Enable the tile edit icon in the footer
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Control which status bar icons are shown
Button backlight brightness will adjust based on current screen brightness level
Button backlight will only appear when buttons are pressed rather than on all the time. Timeout still impacts this feature.
Configure icon and text styles for the statusbar battery indicator
Always display battery percentage when charging
Display estimated remaining battery life when available
Display and customize battery bar near status bar or navigation bar
Blend full/empty colors corresponding to battery percentage
Full → empty: red ← green ← blue ← red
Full → empty: red → green → blue → red
Show heads up only for dialer or messaging app if they are not in foreground
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name

Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Allows unlocking the device without having to wake up the screen first
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Animate the FOD icon when turning on the screen
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Display roaming indicator in signal icon when in roaming mode
Use pre-p mobiletype icons for signal (Reboot required)
Show app volume in volume panel
These are power saving features. They may interfere with services intended to run at idle, like navigation apps. You can whitelist these apps from being affected in the app battery settings.
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Show spacer above settings actionbar for easier use with one hand\nNOTE: restart settings app to see effect
Pause media when volume is muted and resume it by increasing volume within the timeout
Display the number of pending notifications
Lockscreen Blur cant be enabled cause your lockscreen wallpaper doesnt match your homescreen one. Or your device doesnt support Blur.
Replace your notifications with a redesigned version of tickers! \nSlim and less invasive than a standard notification
Replace reTicker background color using notification app main color

Ticker is visible only when notification heads-up is not shown. Devices with center notch should hide cutout under Cutout options.
